justification: Mentions B’s need for wins and preference for proven talent, but ignores B’s injury aversion and playoff-schedule focus (Liam Carter already has a friendly slate). Trade asks B to give a Tier 2 RB for a Tier 3 WR and a questionable TE—poor value and positional fit (B already has TEs). Mislabels Ben Miller as ascending while he’s out. Limited separation of A vs B incentives and an unrealistically high accept probability. Rationale is brief and not evidence-based.
